resources.string: If you like our app, please take a moment to rate it in play store!
How will I know about my nearby location like hopitals, Schools etc?

To know about near by location of hospitals, schools,etc.. you need to go to map your location menu. The map will initially show you your current location.Now click on Hopital button, it will show you your near by hospitals, accordingly click on other buttons to get information.
Go to Query menu from navigation drawer. Now submit few details about yourself like Name , Email & Phone no. and post your query. Your query will be responded shortly.
To give feedback. Write your name,Email & phone no. then submit your feedback. The person from Administration will contact if your feedback are appreciating.
How do I get the weather information of any other place?
Just write your city name, click on ok. It will automatically show you temperature in celsius along with weather condition.
How to know about other districts which are not available in app?
To know about other district click on button ""Know about other districts"" in the respective section, provided at the end.

All About Jharkhand is an informative app to facilitate the people of Jharkhand about the various demographic and non-demographic information.
 It not only provides information about various sectors of Jharkhand like Population Growth Tourist places, Literacy Rate, Gender ratio etc,etc,.. but also give its user the details of climate(to plan beforehand the visit to any district), location of nearby places like hospitals, schools ..
 Users have an option to ask query about their district problems and submitting their positive or negative feedback to government,which would help government to pay attention to the issues.
 At last, we have added quiz to check user knowledge about Jharkhand state.

The basic objectives of our App are:-
 # to empower people to add voice regarding development of Jharkhand state
 # allowing them to give feedback to improve their locality.
 # to facilitate people with all demographic and non demographics information
 # providing details of nearby location of essential places like hospitals, schools etc.
 # adding a quiz to check user knowledge about Jharkhand State.
